item.description:
Hi Ladies and gentlmen,

Since the weather is getter better in Boston, it's a good time to play sports!!!
Would you like to play sports? Such as Soccer, Kickball, Volley ball etc-.

We organize a "SPORTS MEETUP"!! We plan to play Kickball or Ultimate frisbee this time!
If you are interested in this event, please join us!!
Let's enjoy sports and make many good friends!

Place
We will play kickball or Ulimate frisbee at Danehy Park
It is located near Alewife station (Redline)
map
http://maps.google.co...
In this park there are softball fields, we will be there!

Meeting place
Let's meet at the turnstiles at the Russell Field entrance to Alewife at 1:45pm.

If coming by T...
When you exit the train, walk along the platform back in the direction the
train had been coming from, in the *opposite direction from the main exit*.
Follow signs for Russell Field. Meet at the turnstiles.

If coming on foot or by bike...
The Russell Field entrance to Alewife is located on the Minute Man Bike Path
between Russell Field and the main Alewife building. Meet at the
turnstiles.

If coming by car...
There is free parking at the back of Danehy Park. Enter from behind the
Whole Foods Market/Fresh Pond Cinema.

Contact info
I will sent you who will respond "Yes" or "Maybe" my mobile phone number.
If you will get lost, please call me.

Weather
If it will rain on Sunday, this event will be canceled.
If the weather looks bad that morning, please check your e-mail - I will send you our decision by 10 AM.

Preparation
I will bring a ball and a frisbee at Danehy Park.
The weather will be hot. So please bring your drink and towel and cap by yourself.

We are looking forward to enjoying sports with many good friends!!

Thanks
item.how_to_find_us: In this park there are three softball fields we will be there!
item.name: Sports Meetup
